channel.title: api on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in api on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-01
item.description: Facebook’s Meta watch has a camera notch, according to first leaked image (2 minute read) Leaked images of Facebook’s smartwatch show a camera notch that is clearly visible when the watch’s screen is off.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-11
item.description: Disney Bundle with Disney Plus, ESPN+, and ad-free Hulu is $18.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-13
item.description: The Surface Duo, Microsoft’s first-ever Android phone, is $1,400 (6 minute read) The Surface Duo is now available for pre-order and will ship on September 10.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-29
item.description: Apple threatens to remove Airbnb from App Store over virtual experiences commission (2 minute read) Apple has demanded a 30% commission for sales of online classes sold by Airbnb and ClassPass.
